channel.title: Dice GUI
channel.description: Something I made for my final project during Summer camp. We had to create something that demenstrated Polymorphism (sp?), inheritance, and err..... encapsulation (i think, [b]Thanks Franky[/b]) thing... anyways, me and my partner (I did all the work :P) made a gui that simulates dice rolls. YOu have to javac all of them since I didn't have time to make the .class :P. Pretty basic, uses swing to make the gui and I am still a rookie lol..... java the TestDice
